name: Wild Season - Inspired by Harvest Moon
blurb: Inspired by Harvest Moon Games. We aim to bring an immersive Farming experience focused on story, relationships and more.

rewards.reward: No Reward
SEEDLING\r\nour undying gratitude for helping us towards our goal! Every little helps!\r\nAnd the best part! DHL informs us that shipping our undying gratitude is completely free!

Sprout!\r\n(or 5 USD)\r\nAccess to backer only surveys, game input, backer forums, reward tiers and stretch goal input. Receive two HD wallpapers for your desktop or phone! AND a special badge to put on your forum's & social media + All previous rewards

EARLY RISING FARMER\r\nLimited stocks only! A chance to get a digital copy of the game in the platform of their choice for 4.33 pounds or (7 USD). One copy per person. (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)

FARMER
(or 10 USD) 
gets you 1 digital copy of the game, in the platform of your choice (based on available platforms). 
 Add 4 pounds (or 6.40 USD for an extra copy!) + All previous rewards  (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)
BETA TESTING FARMER\r\n(or 20 USD) \r\nParticipate in the closed beta to help QA The game! + all previous rewards  (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)
MUSICIAN\r\n(or 24.24 USD)  \r\nA digital copy of the soundtrack composed by our awesome composer Andre Colares + All previous rewards  (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)

LAND OWNER
(or 32 USD)
gets you 1  copy of the game on each platform that the game is published on. Because one platform is not enough.
+ All previous rewards

 (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)

BUG FARMER
(or 40 USD) 
Be invited to participate in the early stage alpha! Help steer the direction of the game and resolve issues early on in development + All previous rewards
LIMITED STOCKS
 (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)

DESIGNER (44.20 USD)

Design or tell us a specific item of customization you want! Wether its a hair style design, an accessory, a top , shoes, etc. To design/pic more than one item add an additional 20 pounds. For each 20 pounds you can design/select one more item.

+ All previous rewards

COLLECTOR
(or 48 USD)
 a Limited Collectors Edition artwork signed by the artist and key members of the team (this is a different unique piece of artwork that is different from the postcard available to all tiers)

+ All previous non-limited rewards
 (add 5 pounds for a special edition postcard to be sent to you)
WILD ARTISTE\r\n(or 65 USD)\r\nAll the previous non-limited rewards AND a digital PDF Artbook of Wild Season's artwork and how the game was made  EXCEPT the limited collectors edition artwork

COUNCIL MEMBER
(or 113 USD)
Same rewards as the Wild Artiste PLUS a printed copy of the Art Book

Additional Shipping fee's may be incurred. Please PM us if you are interested, we are in talks with various suppliers to try and produce them locally based on demand to minimse costs
TOWN BENEFICIARY(or 163 USD)\r\n\r\nAs a town beneficiary we will name a street or road after you! In addition to all the other rewards

MAYOR
(or 242 USD)
We will name one (1) of five (5) characters after you (or name of your choosing). 

Add an extra 50 pounds (or 80 USD) and we will include a character sketch of you (picture must be provided.

add an extra 100 pounds (or 160 USD) and we will not only include a character sketch of you (picture must be provided) but we will use that character in-game, and include the printed art book.

+ All previous rewards (including limited rewards) except the printed art book

T SHIRT TOWNIE - Gen one of our limited edition Kickstarter Special Wild Season T-Shirts - Show off your backer pride! \r\nAlso includes: Our gratitude, Backer only content, The Game (Kickstarter edition) on each plat., Beta Testing, Soundtrack, Alpha Testing, Option to design acessory & PDF Art Book
T-SHIRT TOWNIE (With printed art book) - Same rewards as the T-Shirt townie but you get a copy of the printed art book too.

ARCHITECT - Design the exterior of your house with us! LIMITED STOCKS ONLY! Showoff to the world your unique home! (This will become an option as the  "final" version of your home). Also includes our gratitude, backer content, The game on all platforms (kickstarter edition), beta testing, alpha testing, soundtrack, accessory design access, unique artwork pdf art-book, printed art-book & T-Shirt.\r\n\r\nThis pledge level only lets you design the EXTERIOR of your home. Certain limitations will apply based on game & map size.

INTERIOR DESIGNER  - Design the INTERIOR of your house with us! LIMITED STOCKS ONLY! Showoff to the world your unique home! (This will become an option as the  "final" version of your home). Also includes our gratitude, backer content, The game on all platforms (kickstarter edition), beta testing, alpha testing, soundtrack, accessory design access, unique artwork pdf art-book, printed art-book & T-Shirt\r\n\r\nThis pledge level only lets you design the INTERIOR of your home. Certain limitations will apply based on game & map size.

T-SHIRT MAYOR - When Playing the game you will be given customization options to customize your character. Anytime during the first year of release you can send us a screenshot or picture of your character and WE WILL MAKE A CUSTOM T-SHIRT WITH HIM OR HER! Whilst the layout will remain the same, you can choose to replace the stock main players with your own customized version, and include your player's partner in the t-shirt\r\n\r\nThis pledge level also includes, our gratitude, backer only content, the game (kickstarter edition) on all platforms, Option to design an acessory, the Unique Artwork, PDF ArtBook,  Regular T-Shirt & Custom T-Shirt Add 30 pounds to include the printed artbook (530)

ARCHITECT & INTERIOR DESIGNER  - Design the INTERIOR & EXTERIOR of your house with us! LIMITED STOCKS ONLY! Showoff to the world your unique home! (This will become an option as the  "final" version of your home). Also includes our gratitude, backer content, The game on all platforms (kickstarter edition), beta testing, alpha testing, soundtrack, accessory design access, unique artwork pdf art-book, printed art-book & T-Shirt\r\n\r\nThis pledge level only lets you design the INTERIOR & EXTERIOR of your home. Certain limitations will apply based on game & map size.

EXECUTIVE HERMIT
(or 1616 USD)
Be invited to Design (or help us design) The Hermit and his home. We will send you all the nescessary components to help us develop the Hermit's home in your own image.

+ All previous rewards, including limited rewards

EXECUTIVE MAYOR
(or 2747 USD)
Be invited to join us for a meal and evening at either GDC San Francisco or GDC Europe
And be credited as an executive producer in the game

+ All previous rewards (Except the Executive Hermit Reward)
